references.paper_title: Expressive body capture: 3d hands, face, and body from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces SMPL-X, which is used to represent human characters, and it is frequently referenced in the paper as a key component of their approach.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper is likely important because it presents CLIP, and it is used to extract image features.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, and the current paper uses them, so it is very likely this citation is important.
